speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: Premiums will continue to soar double digits and even triple digits in many cases.
verified_claim: Obamacare premiums nationwide have increased by double and triple digits.

speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: Our budget calls for one of the single largest increases in defense spending history in this country.
verified_claim: Says his budget "calls for one of the largest increases in national defense spending in American history."
verified_claim_article_title: Trump wrongly claims historic defense increase

speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: -- 50 days -- we've already experienced an unprecedented 40-percent reduction in illegal immigration on our Southern border; 61 percent since Inauguration Day -- 61 percent.
verified_claim: In the first full month of my administration following the issuance of my executive orders, illegal immigration on our southern border fell by an unprecedented 40 percent.
verified_claim_article_title: Donald Trump trumpets 40 percent decrease in illegal border crossings. Is he right?
